snippet: By making his choices in a group, President Obama and his strategists are hoping to put pressure on Senate Republicans to confirm them.
abstract: Pres Obama will nominate slate of three candidates--Cornelia T L Pillard, Patricia Ann Millett and Robert L Wilkins-- to fill remaining vacancies on United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit, often described as nation's second most powerful court.
lead_paragraph: By making his choices in a group, President Obama and his strategists are hoping to put pressure on Senate Republicans to confirm them.

headline.seo: Obama to Nominate 3 to Fill Posts on Key Appeals Court
headline.main: Obama to Nominate 3 to Fill Posts on Key Appeals Court
headline.print_headline: Obama to Nominate 3 to Fill Posts on Key Appeals Court
